original_text: But I, the Lord, will speak. Whatever I say will certainly happen. It will happen very soon. Understand this, you people who refuse to obey me. I will do this while you are still alive. I will do all the things that I have said. That is what the Almighty Lord says.” ’
korean_text: 나는 여호와라 내가 말하리니 내가 하는 말이 다시는 더디지 아니하고 응하리라 반역하는 족속이여 내가 너희 생전에 말하고 이루리라 나 주 여호와의 말이니라 하셨다 하라

sentences.original_text: But I, the Lord, will speak.
Whatever I say will certainly happen.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 말하는 것은 반드시 일어날 것이다

sentences.original_text: you people who refuse to obey me.
I will do this while you are still alive.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희가 아직 살아있을 때 이것을 행하리라

sentences.original_text: I will do all the things that I have said.
That is what the Almighty Lord says.
